# Langton's Loops – minimal seed pattern
# States 0-7:
#   0 = background
#   1 = sheath/wall
#   2 = core data carrier
#   3 = turn signal
#   4 = advance signal
#   5 = ?
#   6 = ?
#   7 = ?
#
# This is the classic 15×15 Langton loop seed.
000000000000000
011111111111110
012222222222210
012111111112210
012122222212210
012121111212210
012121001212210
012121001212210
012121111212210
012122222212210
012111111112210
012222222222210
011111111111110
000000000000000
000000000000000
